title: Frost Staff
summaries: The Frost Staff is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires a frost bolt that travels in a straight line, pierces a single enemy, then disappears after striking a second and also inflicts the Frostbite(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) debuff upon contact for a duration of 7 seconds. The Frost Staff has a 1/50 (2%) chance to drop from Icy Mermen and Ice Elementals, both of which are found in the Snow biome or Ice biome.
